original: Paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo anārammaṇoti?
paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo sārammaṇoti?
Ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, paññā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā sārammaṇāti?
Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ekadeso sārammaṇo ekadeso anārammaṇoti?
